DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the investigators pose the question which influence the opioid circuit has on positive valent situations in dreams.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of the Opiate Antagonist Naltrexone on the Emotional Valence of Dreams
DOC.criteria: Written informed consent Healthiness Good capacity of remembering dreams No opiate consumption Simultaneous participation in other studies Addictive disorder Abnormal liver function Abnormal kidney function Hypersensitivity to active ingredient or pharmaceutical additives Hereditary galactose intolerance Lactase deficiency Glucosegalactose malabsorption Intake of opioid medication
